title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.129 - Upstate Correctional Facility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 100.129 - Upstate Correctional Facility

State Regulations
(a) There shall be in the department an
institution to be known as Upstate Correctional Facility which shall be located
in the Town of Malone in Franklin County and which shall consist of property
under the jurisdiction of the department. (b) Upstate Correctional Facility shall be a
correctional facility for males 18 years of age or older; provided, however, that males between the ages of 18 and 21 may be placed therein in accordance
with Part 110 of this Title. (c) Upstate Correctional Facility shall be classified as a maximum security
facility, to be used as a general confinement facility. Notes

100.129

New

York State Register July 22, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 29, eff. 7/22/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
